name: Chittagong to Nilgiri Bandarban
describe: Nilgiri is a collection of multiple variable sizes hill area in Bandarban. Bandarban itself is a hill district in Banglades.

name: Chittagong to Sajek Valley Rangamati Bandarban
describe: Sajek Valley is one of the popular tourist spots in Bangladesh situated among the hills of the Kasalong range of mountains

name: Chittagong to Cox Bazar Sea-beach
describe: Cox's Bazar Beach, located at Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh, is the longest natural sea beach in the world running 150 kilometres (93 mi)

name: Chittagong to Sundarban Bagerhat
describe: Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal.

name: Chittagong to St. Martin's Island
describe: St. Martin's Island is a small island in the northeastern part of the Bay of Bengal, south of the Cox's Bazar the southernmost part of Bangladesh.

name: Chittagong to Jaflong Sylhet Gowainghat Upazila
describe: Jaflong is a hill station and tourist destination in the Division of Sylhet, Bangladesh. It is located in Gowainghat Upazila of Sylhet District.
